alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:16PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of southeastern St. Johns County through 545 PM EDT... At 516 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower capable of producing a landspout near Saint Augustine South, or 8 miles northeast of Hastings, moving northeast at 15 mph. Some rotation was noted on radar with this shower. HAZARD...Brief landspout and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine Shores, Saint Augustine South and Elkton. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
